General.Name: Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes chicken and swine products in Thailand. It operates in five segments: Poultry, Swine, Feed Mill, Retail, and Other. It also distributes frozen and chilled chicken products; produces and distributes feed mill and processed products; produces and distributes swine products; and produces and distributes broiler chicken. In addition, the company is involved in the research of cattle diseases; manufacture of vaccine, sacks, and plastic sacks; production and distribution of sauce and seasoning products; and renewable energy activities. Further, it offers credits and guarantees; operates as a consulting and service provider for logistics software; and breeds and distributes pets. The company also exports its products. Thaifoods Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
